mapper.select: SELECT cevent_name, cevent_type, csrcip, cdstip, date_format( loccur_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) loccur_time, imerge_count FROM seim_es_log WHERE cevent_name is not null AND cevent_name != ''
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(amount),0) amount FROM seim_logs_amount WHERE `id` > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})*1000 AND `id` <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})*1000

SELECT cevent_type,SUM(amount) amount FROM seim_es_cevent_type WHERE `time` > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})*1000 AND `time` <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})*1000 GROUP BY cevent_type
select dict_label from dictionary_data where dict_type = 'ceventtype' and dict_value = #{i,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
